channel.title: Can't connect to Oracle
channel.description:
The following error occurs during test connection after creating a data source with Oracle. ![image|614x121](upload://bOnILLhnaDNNG3Dt5Zaoie4eksQ.png)
I think it's because Oracle's DB user doesn't have any privilege.
It's not solved even if I grant DB user "select any dictionary".
Can I know what kind of authority redash requires more?

item.title: Can't connect to Oracle
item.dc:creator: aizoakjh
item.description:
The following error occurs during test connection after creating a data source with Oracle.

I think it’s because Oracle’s DB user doesn’t have any privilege.

It’s not solved even if I grant DB user “select any dictionary”.

Can I know what kind of authority redash requires more?

Read full topic
